AI Description: Python is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language known for its readability and syntax simplicity, making it an excellent choice for both beginners and experienced developers. Python 3.7 is a specific version of Python that introduced several new features, optimizations, and security enhancements.
Core Features: Easy-To-Read Syntax, Extensive Standard Library, Support For Multiple Programming Paradigms (Procedural, Object-Oriented, Functional), Dynamic Typing & Automatic Memory Management, Cross-Platform Compatibility, Large Community & Ecosystem Of Libraries & Frameworks, Regularly Updated With New Features & Improvements
General Tags: Programming Language, Interpreted Language, High-Level Language
